summary: Beautiful Katie Lapp has always felt something missing in her simple Amish existence -- until a mysterious "Englisher" comes to Lancaster County looking for the baby girl she gave up for adoption 19 years ago.
cast: Sherry Stringfield|Sarah Maine|Willie Stratford|Danielle Panabaker|Jason Loughlin|Sandra Elise Williams|Bill Oberst Jr.|Wyatt Lanier|Burgess Jenkins|Dalton Parrish|David Topp|Richard Fullerton|Nancy Saunders|Rachel St. Gelais|Jana Allen|Sarah E. title: El desprecio
